33.eng-name: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:(the wife of the Prophet) Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to let his head in (the house) while he was in the mosque and I would comb and oil his hair. When in I`tikaf he used not to enter the house except for a need

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَدْخُلُ الْبَيْتَ إِلاَّ لِحَاجَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Mu'takif not to enter the house except for a need.
